title: New: Teen Ravine – Hall of Horrors
body:
There’s a real swing to this new track from Toronto’s **Teen Ravine**.

With an almost Scott Walker-esque level of grandeur to it, _Hall of Horrors_ is how I imagine Tobias Jesso Jr. writing a song for Bon Iver might sound. Steeped in a silky smooth coating of romanticism, Teen Ravine’s second offering is a hugely exciting one.

Steeped in a silky smooth coating of romanticism, Teen Ravine’s second offering is a hugely exciting \[…\]
